docs.lead_paragraph: Note: This lesson was originally published on an older version of The Learning Network; the link to the related Times article will take you to a page on the old site.

headline.main: Take Me Out of the Ballgame?

docs.abstract: In this lesson, students will curate exhibits for the National Baseball Hall of Fame that document and analyze the current baseball drug-use scandal.
docs.snippet: In this lesson, students will curate exhibits for the National Baseball Hall of Fame that document and analyze the current baseball drug-use scandal.

byline.original: By SARAH KAVANAGH and JAVAID KHAN

docs.lead_paragraph: After making a major decision, a couple chooses not to go out on New Year’s Eve.
docs.snippet: After making a major decision, a couple chooses not to go out on New Year’s Eve.
